name: TOO MUCH COFFEE
description:
A tiny, silly & endless game about drinking too much coffee and feeling

S H A K Y . . .

Switch what arm to control by pressing CTRL on the keyboard

Made for Game Maker's Toolkit 2020 under the theme, "Out of Control".

made by:

Marlène Delrive (programming, art, design) & Jacob Rasmussen (sound, design)
